description: Data from cement mills and grinding systems

fields.mill_feed_rate_tph: float, tonnes per hour of cement
fields.separator_motor_status: integer, separator motor status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.gypsum_feed_rate_tph: float, gypsum feed rate in tonnes per hour
fields.flyash_feed_rate_tph: float, fly ash feed rate in tonnes per hour
fields.slag_feed_rate_tph: float, slag feed rate in tonnes per hour
fields.residue_45_micron_pct: float, residue on 45 micron sieve in %
fields.specific_power_consumption_kwh_t: float, specific power consumption in kWh/t
fields.mill_high_vibration_alarm: integer, high vibration alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.separator_blockage_alarm: integer, separator blockage alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.mill_overload_alarm: integer, mill overload alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.separator_efficiency_drop_alarm: integer, separator efficiency drop alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.clinker_feed_tph: float, clinker feed rate in tonnes per hour
fields.additive_feed_tph: float, additive feed rate in tonnes per hour
fields.cement_mill_power_kw: float, power consumption of cement mill
fields.cement_mill_outlet_temp_c: float, temperature at cement mill outlet (Celsius)
fields.cement_mill_vibration_mm: float, cement mill vibration in mm
